channel.title: Recommendation on Inertry
channel.description: Recent content in Recommendation on Inertry

item.title: Recommendation - PNPM, the fastest NPM replacement system
item.description: It’s the fastest NPM ever. It’s been a while since I found out, but I haven’t really applied it. Key features include: Speed - 3x faster than NPM. It’s faster than Yarn. Saving Capacity - Even with multiple projects, all node_modules’ actual files are shared. Module Added Speed - Faster when adding individual module dependencies to a project. I love it. Comfort - Just replace npm with pnpm for use!
